## Bees are cool

There are nearly 20,000 known species of bees in seven recognized biological families. They are found on every continent except Antarctica, in every habitat on the planet that contains insect-pollinated flowering plants.


## Slide with Bullets

- There are 20,000 known species of bees in seven recognised biological familes.
- They are found in every continent except Antarctica.
- They are found in every habitat on the planet that contains insect-pollinated flowering plants.
